trans-unit.source: SharePoint Server Farm configuration | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: SharePoint Server Farm configuration | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn about the default configuration of SharePoint farms when you use the SharePoint Server Farm feature of the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the default configuration of SharePoint farms when you use the SharePoint Server Farm feature of the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: SharePoint Server Farm is a feature of the Azure preview portal that automatically creates a preconfigured SharePoint Server 2013 farm for you.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint Server Farm is a feature of the Azure preview portal that automatically creates a preconfigured SharePoint Server 2013 farm for you.

trans-unit.source: The following sections provide configuration details for each farm.
trans-unit.target: The following sections provide configuration details for each farm.

trans-unit.source: The basic SharePoint farm consists of three virtual machines in this configuration:
trans-unit.target: The basic SharePoint farm consists of three virtual machines in this configuration:

trans-unit.source: Azure subscription: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Azure subscription: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Azure domain names (also known as cloud services): Separate domain names are automatically created for each virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Azure domain names (also known as cloud services): Separate domain names are automatically created for each virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Storage account: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Storage account: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine image: Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine image: Windows Server 2012 R2.

trans-unit.source: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Domain administrator account name: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Domain administrator account name: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Domain administrator account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Domain administrator account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine image: SQL Server 2014 RTM Enterprise on Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine image: SQL Server 2014 RTM Enterprise on Windows Server 2012 R2.

trans-unit.source: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Database access account name: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Database access account name: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Database access account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Database access account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server service account name: sqlservice (default).
trans-unit.target: SQL Server service account name: sqlservice (default).

trans-unit.source: SQL Server service account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server service account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine image: SharePoint Server 2013 Trial.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine image: SharePoint Server 2013 Trial.

trans-unit.source: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: SharePoint farm account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint farm account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: SharePoint farm passphrase: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint farm passphrase: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: The high-availability SharePoint farm consists of nine virtual machines in this configuration:
trans-unit.target: The high-availability SharePoint farm consists of nine virtual machines in this configuration:

trans-unit.source: Azure subscription: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Azure subscription: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Azure domain names (also known as cloud services): Separate domain names are created according to the figure above.
trans-unit.target: Azure domain names (also known as cloud services): Separate domain names are created according to the figure above.

trans-unit.source: Storage account: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Storage account: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine image: Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine image: Windows Server 2012 R2.

trans-unit.source: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Domain administrator account name: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Domain administrator account name: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Domain administrator account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Domain administrator account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine image: SQL Server 2014 RTM Enterprise on Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine image: SQL Server 2014 RTM Enterprise on Windows Server 2012 R2.

trans-unit.source: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Size: A5 (default) for database servers, A0 (default) for the file share witness.
trans-unit.target: Size: A5 (default) for database servers, A0 (default) for the file share witness.

trans-unit.source: Database access account name: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Database access account name: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Database access account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Database access account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server service account name: sqlservice (default).
trans-unit.target: SQL Server service account name: sqlservice (default).

trans-unit.source: SQL Server service account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server service account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine image: SharePoint Server 2013 Trial.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine image: SharePoint Server 2013 Trial.

trans-unit.source: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Host name prefix: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: SharePoint farm account password: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint farm account password: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: SharePoint farm passphrase: Specified during the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint farm passphrase: Specified during the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The SharePoint servers are created from the SharePoint Server 2013 Trial image.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The SharePoint servers are created from the SharePoint Server 2013 Trial image.

trans-unit.source: To continue using the virtual machine after the trial expiration, you need to convert the installation to use a Retail or Volume License key for either the Standard or Enterprise edition of SharePoint Server 2013.
trans-unit.target: To continue using the virtual machine after the trial expiration, you need to convert the installation to use a Retail or Volume License key for either the Standard or Enterprise edition of SharePoint Server 2013.

trans-unit.source: The SharePoint Server Farm feature of the Azure preview portal creates virtual machines in Service Management.
trans-unit.target: The SharePoint Server Farm feature of the Azure preview portal creates virtual machines in Service Management.

trans-unit.source: To create SharePoint Server 2013 farms in Azure Resource Manager, see [Deploy SharePoint Farms with Azure Resource Manager templates](virtual-machines-workload-template-sharepoint.md).
trans-unit.target: To create SharePoint Server 2013 farms in Azure Resource Manager, see [Deploy SharePoint Farms with Azure Resource Manager templates](virtual-machines-workload-template-sharepoint.md).

trans-unit.source: Set up a SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud for testing
trans-unit.target: Set up a SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud for testing
